text: They sparked romance rumors when they co - starred in the Baywatch reboot last year. And on Wednesday, Zac Efron, 30, and Alexandra Daddario, 32, added fuel to the dating flames as the two were spotted visiting a neighborhood pet store in Los Feliz. The rumored couple were all smiles as they browsed through the dog toys with their two pets in tow. Puppy love : Zac Efron and Alexandra Daddario fuel dating rumors as the two visit a neighborhood pet store in Los Feliz Zac dressed casually for the outing, clad in a black cotton Alternative Apparel shirt and dark green pants. He kept his black sunglasses on inside the store and looked undercover in his olive green hat with the number three displayed on the front. The Greatest Showman actor
